snippet: The vote this week of the Steinhardt School of Culture, Education and Human Development was 117 to 45 against the president, John Sexton.
abstract: New York University's Steinhardt School of Culture, Education and Human Development votes 117 to 45 against university president John Sexton, bringing to four the number of NYU schools or campuses who have rejected his leadership through no confidence votes; votes call attention to strong opinions that Sexton’s 11 years in office continue to generate.
lead_paragraph: The vote this week of the Steinhardt School of Culture, Education and Human Development was 117 to 45 against the president, John Sexton.

headline.main: Fourth No Confidence Vote for the President of N.Y.U.
headline.print_headline: Fourth No Confidence Vote For the President of N.Y.U.
